item.title: Aspose.CAD for .NET 20.12 - Release Notes
item.description: This page contains release notes for Aspose.CAD for .NET 20.12 Key Summary Category CADNET-1300 Unstable drawing of diameter symbol at Cad3DTests.dimensionTest test on Win10/Ubuntu Enhancement CADNET-1242 Image loading failed: The arithmetic operation caused an overflow Enhancement CADNET-1299 ArgumentOutOfRangeException on loading DWG Enhancement CADNET-1292 “Image loading failed: Was excepted “}”” exception when open document DXF file Enhancement CADNET-1289 Content in missing when exporting DWG to PDF Enhancement CADNET-1259 DWG to PDF: improper text rendering in exported PDF Enhancement CADNET-1258 “Image loading failed: An item with the same key has already been added.
